meanings.definition: The art or practice of taking photographs from a distance using a telephoto lens.
meanings.sent1: She admired the telephotographies in the gallery, each capturing a distant scene.
meanings.sent2: His telephotographies of wildlife were stunning, showing animals up close from afar.
meanings.sent3: The detective used telephotographies to spy on suspects without being seen.
meanings.sent4: Her telephotographies were like windows to faraway worlds, revealing details unseen by the naked eye.
meanings.sent5: The telephotographies of the city skyline at night were so clear, it felt like being there in person.

meanings.definition: A collection of photographs taken with a telephoto lens.
meanings.sent1: The exhibit showcased a variety of telephotographies, each telling a unique story.
meanings.sent2: He organized his telephotographies by theme, creating a visual narrative of his travels.
meanings.sent3: The telephotographies on display were so detailed, it felt like stepping into the scenes.
meanings.sent4: Her telephotographies formed a mosaic of colors and shapes, blending reality with artistry.
meanings.sent5: The telephotographies captured rare moments in nature, frozen in time for all to see.
